Name: Standing Statue of a Young Man
Description: The statue portrays the realistic face of a young man with a tall, slim body, which is simply and elegantly sculptured. The man is standing with his arms hanging at his sides. He holds a small staff in each hand. As is customary for male statues, the left leg is forward, giving balance to the composition and an impression of motion. He wears a round wig of small curls and a short kilt, the overlap of which is pleated and held in place by a belt.The artisan succeded in depicting this thin tall body of the young man in a simple style.
